新型コロナウイルス感染症が心配なときに: If you feel concerned about COVID-19
かかりつけ医に相談することもできます。: You can also consult with your doctor.
詳しくはこちらをご参照ください。: For more information, please refer to:
詳細を見る（東京都福祉保健局）: For more information (Bureau of Social Welfare and Public Health website)
県内の最新感染動向: Latest updates on COVID-19 in Okinawa
自分や家族の症状に不安や心配があればまずは電話相談をどうぞ: Consult over the phone if you have any concerns
詳細を見る（沖縄県公式ホームページ）: For more information (Okinawa Prefectural Government website)
相談方法は、症状や状況別で3つに分かれます: Advice offered here is divided into three categories, depending on your symptoms and situation.
かかりつけ医がいて症状のある方: You have a primary care doctor and are having symptoms
かかりつけ医がいない症状のある方: You do not have a primary care doctor and are having symptoms
軽い症状があり不安のある方: You are worried because you are having light symptoms
かかりつけ医がいて、次の症状がある方: If you have a primary care doctor and are having the following symptoms
発熱や咳などの{minorSymptom}がある: You have {minorSymptom} like fever and cough
妊娠中の方、重症化しやすい方（高齢者、糖尿病、心不全、呼吸器疾患（COPD等）等: If you are pregnant or have a condition that could worsen (an underlying condition like advanced age, diabetes, heart problems, respiratory illness (e.g. COPD), undergoing dialysis, taking immunosuppressant or cancer medications, etc.) please get consultation immediately. If you do not fit this description, please get consultation if you have had symptoms for four days or more.
息苦しさ（呼吸困難）、強いだるさ（倦怠感）、高熱等の{majorSymptom}: If you are short of breath (having difficulty breathing), sluggish (fatigued), a high fever, or other {majorSymptom}
症状には個人差がありますので、強い症状と思う場合にはすぐに相談してください。解熱: Symptoms vary between individuals, so if you consider your symptoms severe, get consultation immediately. The same goes for those who have had to continually take fever medicine.
日ごろ受診されている医療機関に電話でご相談ください。: Please get consultation by telephone from the medical institution you usually use.
（上記の症状がない場合も、不安に思う方は、日ごろ受診されている医療機関に電話でご: (Even if you do not have the symptoms listed above, if you are anxious, please get consultation by telephone from the medical institution you usually use.)
かかりつけ医がいない、次の症状がある方: If you do not have a primary care doctor and are having the following symptoms
各保健所の電話番号は沖縄県公式ホームページ: Health care center phone numbers are available on the Okinawa Prefectural Government website.
新型コロナウイルスの感染を疑う方からの相談に対応するため、各保健所に「帰国者・接: A "Consultation Center for Recent Arrivals and People Who Have Been Exposed" have been established at each health care center to counsel those who are suspected of having COVID-19.
上記の症状に当てはまらない方は、新型コロナコールセンターにご相談ください。: If your symptoms do not match the descriptions above, please consult the COVID-19 Call Center.
電話のおかけ間違いが多くなっております。発信の際は今一度電話番号をお確かめの上、: The number of calls to wrong numbers has been increasing. Please confirm the number before calling in order to prevent calling the wrong number.
感染したかもしれないと不安に思う方、感染予防法を知りたい方などは、下記、新型コロ: If you are worried that you may have been infected or if you want to know how to prevent infection, please call the Novel Coronavirus Call Center listed below.
新型コロナ受診相談窓口、またはかかりつけ医によって新型コロナ外来（帰国者・接触者: If your primary care doctor or the COVID-19 testing consultation desk has determined that you require COVID-19 outpatient testing (recent arrivals and those who have been exposed)
医師が検査の必要性を判断いたします。: A physician determines that testing is necessary
マスクをして公共交通機関をできるだけ使わずに受診をしてください。: Avoid public transportation, wear a mask, and get tested.
医師により検査が必要だと判断されPCR検査を受けた結果: The results of the PCR test which was determined necessary by a physician
感染症指定医療機関等への入院、又は宿泊施設等での療養となります: You will be hospitalized at a medical institution designated for contagious diseases or housed in a lodging facility for medical treatment and recuperation.
自宅で安静に過ごし、必要に応じて医療機関を受診してください: Rest at home and seek treatment at a medical institution if necessary.
ただし、症状が良くならない場合は再度受診相談窓口またはかかりつけ医に相談してくだ: However, if symptoms do not improve, please consult the testing consultation desk or your primary doctor again.

臨時休校中の新型コロナウイルス感染症対応についてのお願い: How to deal with COVID-19 during emergency school closure
不特定多数の人の集まる場所等への外出を避け、基本的に自宅で過ごしてください。: Have your children basically stay at home and avoid going to crowded areas.
手洗い、咳エチケット等により、感染予防に努めてください。: Please make sure that everyone in your family washes hands regularly and practice cough etiquette.
【参考】感染症予防のための正しい手洗い方法（動画）: [Video] How to wash your hands properly to prevent infection
規則正しい生活を心がけ、日常の健康管理に十分気を付けてください。: Try to live a regular life and monitor the health of your children daily.
感染症を疑う場合の対応: If you think your child is infected
各保健所にご相談ください: If your child has cold-like symptoms, extreme fatigue, or diffficulty breathing, call your public health center.
各保健所の電話番号について: Please find the contact number of Okinawa Health Centers in the section "COVID-19 Call Center (「新型コロナウイルス感染症コールセンター」)" at the web page.
詳細は、各学校からのお知らせ等をご確認ください。: For details: check information from your school.

当サイトは沖縄県の新型コロナウイルス感染症 (COVID-19) に関する最新情: This website was opened by volunteers of Code for Okinawa in association with the Okinawa Prefectural Government to provide the latest information on the novel coronavirus disease (COVID-19).
沖縄県と連携し、県による公式情報と客観的な数値をわかりやすく伝えることで、沖縄県: By conveying official information of the Okinawa Prefectural Government and objective data in an easy-to-understand way, this site aims to allow Okinawa residents, companies with offices in Okinawa, and visitors to Okinawa to grasp the current situation and take measures and precautions accordingly.
開発は、複製・改変が許されたオープンソースライセンスで公開されている、東京都公式: It uses an open source licence that permits copying and redistribution, and is based on the Tokyo Metropolitan Government COVID-19 Task Force website.
当サイトは以下の環境でご覧いただくことを推奨いたします。: The following browsers are recommended for viewing this site.
Google Chrome 最新版（Windows 10以上, Android: Google Chrome (Latest version, Windows 10 or later, Android 8.0 or later)
Safari 最新版（macOS, iOS）: Apple Safari (Latest version on macOS, iOS)
※ 推奨環境以外で利用された場合や、推奨環境下でもご利用のブラウザの設定等によっ: Please understand that this website may not display correctly when using a browser that is not recommended, or depending upon the settings of the recommended browser.
当サイトへのリンクは自由です。: No permission is required to provide a link to this site.
JavaScriptを無効にして使用された場合、各ページが正常に動作しない、また: If JavaScript is disabled, the content or functionality of the website can be limited or unavailable.
当サイトをご利用の際には、JavaScriptを有効にして頂きますようお願いいた: Please make sure to enable JavaScript when browsing this site.
クッキーとは、Webコンテンツからの要求で利用者の手元の端末に一時的に保存される: A cookie is data sent from a website and temporarily stored on the user's computer. Here, cookies may be used to track website activity.
ブラウザに関する情報の収集を希望しない場合は、インターネット閲覧ソフト（ブラウザ: If you do not wish your browsing data to be collected, you can disable cookies from your web browser.
ただし、クッキーを受け入れない設定をされている場合は、当サイトの機能が正常に動作: However, if you disable cookies, this site may not function properly.
Google Analyticsの利用について: Regarding the use of Google Analytics
当サイトでは、サービス向上やサイトの改善のためにGoogle LLCの提供するア: This site uses Google Analytics, an analytics service provided by Google LLC, to track website activity for site improvement and provision of better services.
Google Analyticsは、当サイトが発行するクッキー (Cookie): Google Analytics uses cookies to collect anonymous web usage data (e.g. page views, traffic, browser information).The use of cookies is based on Google's privacy policy and terms.
取得したデータは Webサイト利用状況の分析、サイト運営者へのレポートの作成、そ: The acquired data will only be used for purposes related to analyzing website use, creating reports for the site administrator and providing other services.
Google Analyticsの利用規約及びプライバシーポリシーに関する説明に: About Google Analytics Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, please visit the Google Analytics site.
当サイトに掲載されている情報の正確性については万全を期していますが、東京都は利用: Although every effort has been made to ensure the accuracy of the information posted on this site, Tokyo Metropolitan Government will not be responsible for any actions taken by users using the information on this site.
また、利用者が当サイトを利用したことにより発生した利用者の損害及び利用者が第三者: The Tokyo Metropolitan Government will not be responsible for any damage that may occur to a user or damage that the user may cause to a third party, as a result of using this website.
当サイトに掲載されている情報は、予告なしに変更又は削除することがあります。: Any information on this site may be changed or deleted without prior notice.
本サイトで公表しているデータは、{catalogWebsite}より誰でも自由に: Anyone can freely download the data published on this site from {catalogWebsite}. (Data is scheduled to be added as it becomes available.)
当サイトのソースコードはMITライセンスで公開されており、誰でも自由に利用するこ: The source code of this site is MIT licensed code and can be used by anyone for free.
